sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
**Problem**

Traditional loyalty systems are opaque, manually managed, and prone to errors. Users cannot independently verify their point balances, expiration dates, or transaction history, leading to trust issues. Businesses face operational inefficiencies, data disputes, and limited ability to audit or automate loyalty operations.

Our team currently operates a real world, fully functional offchain loyalty system at [https://soibien\.vn/\.](https://soibien.vn/.) While effective, its offchain nature limits transparency, trustlessness, interoperability, and scalability across partners.



**Proposed Solution**

We will migrate and extend our existing offchain loyalty product onto the Cardano blockchain, creating a transparent, tamper proof, and automated loyalty management system. The solution uses smart contracts and a native asset, LoyaltyToken, to ensure every point issuance, redemption, refund, and expiration event is verifiable on-chain.

 



**How the Solution Works**

1. LoyaltyToken (Native Asset)

-   A special token is minted to represent loyalty points.
-   When users make qualifying transactions (e.g., purchases), LoyaltyTokens are automatically issued to their wallets.



2. Smart Contract Architecture

We use two core smart contracts to manage loyalty operations:

    1. User Container Contract
        1. Function: Stores and tracks each user’s wallet, point balance, and expiration details.
        2. Flow: When a user earns rewards, LoyaltyTokens are deposited directly into their User Container.
    2. Order Container Contract
        1. Function: Handles spending, redemption, and secure logging of loyalty transactions.
        2. Flow: When a user uses points, tokens are transferred from the User Container to the Order Container, ensuring accurate recording of each redemption event.



**Why This Approach**

-  Transparency: All point balances and transactions are on-chain, eliminating disputes.
-  Automation: Smart contracts remove manual operations, reducing errors and administrative costs.
-  Security & Integrity: Tokenized points cannot be modified or duplicated by unauthorized parties.
-  Auditability: Clear transaction history enables easy compliance and reporting.
-  Scalability: The modular container architecture allows businesses to onboard users and merchants without changing core logic.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
**Positive Impact**

- Our project delivers a real world application of Cardano by migrating an existing, actively used off chain loyalty system to an on chain Hydra powered solution. This demonstrates how blockchain can replace traditional backend infrastructure in live commercial environments; not just prototypes. 
- By running a production system on Cardano, we showcase the network’s transparency, speed, and operational reliability to businesses and developers.
- This real deployment encourages broader enterprise adoption, expands the ecosystem of Hydra applications, and highlights Cardano’s capability to support high-throughput consumer use cases such as loyalty, rewards, and e-commerce integrations.



**Measuring Impact**

We will measure impact using clear, trackable indicators, including:

-  Number of active users earning and spending LoyaltyTokens.
-  Transaction volume processed through Hydra heads.

These metrics allow us to quantify adoption, efficiency gains, and real-world usage of Hydra.



**Sharing Output**

-  Open-source smart contracts published on GitHub.
-  Public web app for community testing.
-  Transparent reporting of adoption metrics, user feedback, and technical updates via Github, or gitbook or Google Drive.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
**Capability to Deliver with High Trust and Accountability**

Our team has a strong and verifiable track record in blockchain and Cardano development, giving us the expertise required to deliver this project successfully and transparently.



**Team Expertise**

Our project is led by a highly experienced business leader in the e-commerce sector, supported by a strong and capable development team with proven delivery in software and blockchain integration.

1. **Trần Quân – Founder & Business Leader: **With nearly a decade of experience running and scaling the Sói Biển retail and e-commerce ecosystem, he brings deep expertise in operations, customer engagement, and loyalty programs. His leadership ensures that the project aligns with real commercial needs and delivers meaningful value to end-users and merchants.
2. **Kiều Như Hoa – Product Consultant: **With professional experience in product strategy and marketing, she provides critical insights into user behavior, customer engagement, and product-market fit. Her background helps shape the loyalty system into a practical, user-centered solution that can drive adoption.
3. **Do Ky An \- Technical Lead: **An experienced engineering manager with a strong background in software development, system design, and technical team leadership. She has a track record of managing developers, delivering complex digital products, and ensuring high-quality, reliable system performance.

Together, our leadership and development capabilities allow us to execute this project with both business insight and technical strength, ensuring that the transition from off-chain to on-chain loyalty infrastructure is practical, scalable, and production-ready.



We further maintain trust and accountability through:

-   Transparent milestone-based development
-   Continuous progress updates
-   Public source code and documentation
-   Clear responsibilities and internal code review processes



This ensures stakeholders can track performance, validate progress, and trust the final outcome.



**Validation and Feasibility**

We ensure feasibility of the project through a structured and evidence-based approach:



1. Milestone-Driven Development

Each milestone includes clear outputs, acceptance criteria, and public evidence (GitHub code, testnet demos, tx_hash logs). This ensures measurable progress and continuous validation against the plan.



2. Early User Testing & Feedback Loops

We will deploy early versions on testnet to gather feedback from real users and enterprise partners. Insights from these tests will be used to refine user flows, smart contract logic, and system performance.



3. Technical Feasibility via Incremental Testing

-  Unit tests for all smart contract logic
-  Integration testing of user actions (earn, redeem, refund, expiration)
-  Load and cost simulations, especially with Hydra integration



4. Open Source Transparency

Code, documentation, and system diagrams will be publicly accessible, enabling community review and verification.

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
The project delivers strong value for money to the Cardano ecosystem by generating long-term, reusable benefits far beyond the initial cost.



1. Driving Enterprise Adoption

 The solution directly connects Cardano to traditional businesses through a Loyalty program that can be deployed in retail, F&B, and service industries. This lowers the barrier for enterprise onboarding and unlocks real commercial use-cases, an outcome that typically requires far higher investment.



2. Solving Scalability with Hydra

By applying Hydra, the project addresses a key challenge for real-world adoption: transaction costs. Hydra enables high-volume micro-transactions at extremely low cost, making Cardano viable for thousands of daily retail operations. This provides high ROI relative to development cost.



3. Bringing Mass Users into RealFi

Loyalty points have real utility because they can be redeemed for products and services. This converts non-crypto users into blockchain users without requiring prior Web3 knowledge. The cost of onboarding each user becomes significantly lower than typical crypto adoption campaigns.



4. Enhancing Network Performance

The project serves as a practical template for Layer-2 integration. By showcasing how Hydra increases throughput and reduces congestion, it creates reusable technical patterns that other developers and startups can adopt. 



5. High Leverage for the Ecosystem

All components, architecture, and learnings will be open-sourced. This means future teams can build similar systems at far lower cost, multiplying the value delivered to Cardano.
